name: The Gravedigger (itch) (Wrimor)
description:
Made for Mini Jam 72. I am not super happy with it. I feel like it could be a lot better.

Controls: 

-WASD/Arrows to move

-Dig holes by clicking near your character. Continue to click while standing near the whole to finish digging them. 

-Touching objects attaches your "rope " to them (it works weirdly, but it's what I got working). Press 'e' to release your rope. 

-Press 'e' to talk to people. 

Rules: 

-Normal caskets can go in an hole you dig. 

-Urns go in the little room a screen down. 

-Some caskets are marked with a shape (triangle, square, circle) and must be buried on a screen with a matching shape.
